Page Chronica is an action-oriented word puzzle game that combines elements of side-scrolling action platformers with the forming of words. 

©2012 Red Hare Studios All Rights Reserved. 
"Page Chronica" is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.

夢之語術師 Page Chronica為一款充滿動作的文字益智遊戲，在橫向捲軸平台上冒險的同時挑戰玩家的英文拼字能力。

©2012 Red Hare Studios All Rights Reserved. 
"Page Chronica" is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.

Enjoy the latest "Lights, Camera, Party!" trailer at PlayStation®Home Theatre Auditorium 5!

Feed pizza to an angry dinosaur, throw bananas at a sleeping crowd of monkeys, blast cow-stealing UFOs, jump over a kiddie pool full of hungry sharks and obliterate candy-filled piñatas. All this and so much more in this unique, fast-paced, motion-controlled, insanely hilarious multiplayer party game for up to 8 simultaneous players!

Lights, Camera, Party! is a copyright of Frima Studio inc. © 2012 Frima Studio inc.

請到PlayStation®Home Theatre的劇院5觀賞「Lights, Camera, Party!」的最新影片！

餵披薩給飢餓的恐龍、丟香蕉給正在睡夢中的猴子、擊退偷取乳牛的UFO、跳過都是鯊魚的水池、或破壞充滿糖果的皮納塔。這些都可在這款獨特的爆笑多人遊戲內，以體感方式體驗。一次同時可跟8人遊玩喔！

Lights, Camera, Party! is a copyright of Frima Studio inc. © 2012 Frima Studio inc.

Let’s download the trial version of PlayMemories, take photos in Halloween costumes at Granzella’s lounge “Southern Island Hideaway” and “Edo of Nippon” and edit them into a scary Halloween creation to win a big prize!
You can also download the “PlayMemories x PlayStation®Home” T-shirt for free as a present from both PlayStation®Home and PlayMemories! Wear it and set the mood for the event!

Check out the website for more details!
URL: https://halloween.sony-asia.com

來下載PlayMemories的試用版吧！當您打扮成萬聖節的模樣後，在Granzella的「南島秘密樂園」與「日本大江戶」照相，最後用PlayMemories來編輯成恐怖萬分的適合萬聖節作品，您便有機會贏得大獎！您也可以下載PlayMemories和PlayStation®Home為您準備的禮物─「PlayMemories x PlayStation®Home」免費T恤！穿著此T恤將會更加炒熱萬聖節氣氛！

詳情請瀏覽網頁！
URL: https://halloween.sony-asia.com

Let’s download the trial version of PlayMemories, take photos in Halloween costumes at Granzella’s lounge “Southern Island Hideaway” and “Edo of Nippon” and edit them into a scary Halloween creation to win a big prize!
You can also download the “PlayMemories x PlayStation®Home” T-shirt for free as a present from both PlayStation®Home and PlayMemories! Wear it and set the mood for the event!

Check out the website for more details!
URL: https://halloween.sony-asia.com

來下載PlayMemories的試用版吧！當您打扮成萬聖節的模樣後，在Granzella的「南島秘密樂園」與「日本大江戶」照相，最後用PlayMemories來編輯成恐怖萬分的適合萬聖節作品，您便有機會贏得大獎！您也可以下載PlayMemories和PlayStation®Home為您準備的禮物─「PlayMemories x PlayStation®Home」免費T恤！穿著此T恤將會更加炒熱萬聖節氣氛！

詳情請瀏覽網頁！
URL: https://halloween.sony-asia.com

ITEM.TEXT: 來冒險區歡度2012年萬聖節！

DESCRIPTION.BODY: Adventure District is waiting for your visit with fantastic Halloween decorations and many kinds of mini games!\nWelcome to Adventure District, Halloween version!
冒險區現在改裝得充滿著萬聖節風味，並有許多遊戲等著您體驗！\n歡迎來到萬聖節版冒險區！

Welcome to Aurora 1.6! Many things have changed since your last visit, explore the islands to see what mysteries you can find. The main island now contains a fun new game called 'Blimps'. Cruise around the sky above Aurora taking in the beautiful views, but look out, your opponents will try to tag you with their upgraded ships. We hope you enjoy the new Aurora experience. Happy exploring!
歡迎來到 Aurora 1.6！自上次造訪以來，許多事情都發生了變化。請探索各個島嶼，發現其神秘之處吧。主要島嶼現在包含一款稱之為「Blimps」的有趣新遊戲。在極光群島的天空巡遊，欣賞美麗景觀，但要留心，您的對手可能會使用升級的艦船尾隨之後。我們希望您喜歡全新的極光群島體驗。盡情探索吧！

Let’s download the trial version of PlayMemories, take photos in Halloween costumes at Granzella’s lounge “Southern Island Hideaway” and “Edo of Nippon” to edit them into a scary Halloween creation for a big prize!
Don’t forget to download “PlayMemories x PlayStation®Home” T-shirt for free, it’s a present from both PlayStation®Home and PlayMemories!

URL: https://halloween.sony-asia.com

來下載PlayMemories的試用版吧！當您打扮成萬聖節的模樣後，在Granzella的「南島秘密樂園」與「日本大江戶」照相，最後用PlayMemories來編輯成恐怖萬分的適合萬聖節作品，您便有機會贏得大獎！您也可以下載PlayMemories和PlayStation®Home為您準備的禮物─「PlayMemories x PlayStation®Home」免費T恤！\n\nURL: https://halloween.sony-asia.com

A variety of COOL Halloween themed items are available!!
PlayStation®Home Asia presents you with fantastic Halloween bundles for you!
You can get Halloween items at a great price.
Halloween bundles include selected items from:
・Sony Computer Entertainment
・YECK Entertainment
Let’s make your Halloween 2012 the most awesome one ever!

各種以萬聖節為主題的超酷道具現已登場！！
亞洲PlayStation®Home帶給您許多物美價廉的萬聖節組合包！您可以用優惠價購買萬聖節道具。
萬聖節組合包包括以下開發商的商品：
●Sony Computer Entertainment
●YECK Entertainment
一起讓今年的萬聖節變成最炫的慶典吧！

【For Age 18 and Above】\nSavage Manor is a personal space like no other. Enter if you dare! The tormented manor is steeped in grim history, history that will not remain in the past. Explore the mysterious apartment, but beware of the dangers that lurk within. Can you solve the cryptic riddles and learn the horrible truths ingrained within the structure's living, breathing walls? \nWith a new riddle to solve each day will you be brave enough to return day after day to uncover Savage Manor’s secrets?
【限定18歲以上】\n野蠻莊園可不是一般的個人空間，有膽量你就進來！這座飽受摧殘的莊園瀰漫著腥風血雨的歷史。但這一切並非過去塵埃，而是活生生地展現在你的眼前。探索這座神秘的莊園時，千萬要注意隱藏在其中的危險。你能解開含糊隱蔽的謎題嗎？你能從有生命，會呼吸的牆壁中了解到可怕的事實嗎？\n每天都有新的謎題讓你解謎，但你夠勇敢到每天都回來探索野蠻莊園的秘密嗎？

With a certain spooky holiday just around the corner it is apt that The Morbids have decided to make their appearance in PlayStation®Home. The Morbids consist of The Plague Doctor, China Doll, Scarecrow and Sad Clown and each Morbid comes in a variety of different options including a limited edition version of each that will only be available for select time periods throughout the year so pick them up while you can.
某個可怕的節日將要到來，而這也代表恐怖使者將來訪PlayStation®Home。恐怖使者包含瘟疫醫生、中國娃娃、稻草人、悲傷小丑等恐怖服裝，每系列都有許多不同種類，其中還包含每年只有幾此購買機會的限量版商品，所以請別錯過機會。
Check them out and find your favorite!\nAvailable now!
趕快確認並找出您最喜愛的商品吧！\n現在熱賣中!

ITEM.TEXT: nDreams - Street Moves Avatar Animation Pack
nDreams - Street Moves分身角色動態組合包

DESCRIPTION.HEADER: nDreams - Street Moves Avatar Animation Pack
nDreams - Street Moves分身角色動態組合包
DESCRIPTION.BODY: Find out what kind of movements you can make with “Street Moves Avatar Animation Pack” and be among the first one to show off those movements everywhere in PlayStation®Home!
現在就去看看您能用「Street Moves Avatar Animation Pack」(擴充活動功能)增加什麼新動作，並在PlayStation®Home炫耀給周遭的人看吧！

ITEM.TEXT: nDreams - 擴充活動功能 第2波

DESCRIPTION.HEADER: nDreams - 擴充活動功能 第2波
DESCRIPTION.BODY: From PlayStation®Home upgrade of version 1.70, you can now make totally new movements on your avatar with “Locomotion Vol.2” from “nDreams”!\nFind out what kind of movements you can make with “Locomotion Vol.2” and be among the first one to show off those movements everywhere in PlayStation®Home!
PlayStation®Home更新為1.70版本後，您現在用nDreams的「Locomotion 第2波」(擴充活動功能)就可以讓您的分身角色做全新的動作！\n現在就去看看您能用「Locomotion 第2波」(擴充活動功能)增加什麼新動作，並在PlayStation®Home炫耀給周遭的人看吧！

The Lockwood Halloween Extravaganza continues this week with a new range of Halloween costumes from Fool Throttle. Creepy costumes have been done to death, so Fool Throttle’s created outfits with a twist around the theme of a hot Halloween Beach Party. Some frightening favourites return to the Gift Machine, so if you missed out on Skinny Vinny or Coffin Colin last year, here’s another chance to add them to your Wishlists.
Lockwood大盛會這禮拜持續進行！這次由Fool Throttle提供許多萬聖節服裝供您選擇。令人毛骨悚然的服裝已經過時了，所以Fool Throttle做了適合參加萬聖節沙灘派對的套裝。有些可怕的熱門商品現在也重返於禮品販賣機熱賣，所以如果您去年錯過皮包骨維尼或棺材好漢的話，現在可是您把他們加回購物單的大好機會了。

☆Introducing New Items of the Week☆

You can find the latest released item right here!
Check them out and find your favorite!
☆介紹本週新商品☆\n您可以在此確認最新推出的商品！\n趕快確認並找出您最喜愛的商品吧！
